name: Bomber Chaos (itch)
description:
Instructions:

You can move the wood boxes(the brown ones) with your cursor. Use them to get the grenade to the green line, i.e the finish line without touching the spikes

This game was made for the GMTK 2020 game jam. I hope you will like it. ;-D

I will be really impressed if you manage to beat the game (it's really tough and I also am not a master at it) xD
